releaseNotes:
Version 1.4 updates:
- Added auto-reset feature for attendance and substitutions
- Added time picker dialog for configuring auto-reset time
- Added current period widget with real-time updates
- Added next period preview
- Enhanced teacher schedule display
- Added quick action buttons for common tasks
- Added SMS notification system integration
- Added file upload functionality
- Improved UI/UX with Material 3 design
- Various performance optimizations and bug fixes
